sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Container, Typography, Link, Grid } from '@mui/material';
import { School } from '@mui/icons-material';

function Footer() {
  return (
    <Box
      component="footer"
      sx={{
        py: 3,
        px: 2,
        mt: 'auto',
        backgroundColor: (theme) =>
          theme.palette.mode === 'light'
            ? theme.palette.grey[200]
            : theme.palette.grey[800],
      }}
    >
      <Container maxWidth="lg">
        <Grid container spacing={3}>
          <Grid item xs={12} sm={4}>
            <Box sx={{ display: 'flex', alignItems: 'center', mb: 2 }}>
              <School sx={{ mr: 1 }} />
              <Typography variant="h6" color="text.primary">
                高数我帮你
              </Typography>
            </Box>
            <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
              智能高等数学辅导系统，让学习更轻松、更高效
            </Typography>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} sm={4}>
            <Typography variant="h6" color="text.primary" gutterBottom>
              快速链接
            </Typography>
            <Link href="/" color="inherit" display="block" sx={{ mb: 1 }}>
              首页
            </Link>
            <Link href="/upload-question" color="inherit" display="block" sx={{ mb: 1 }}>
              上传题目
            </Link>
            <Link href="/progress" color="inherit" display="block" sx={{ mb: 1 }}>
              学习进度
            </Link>
            <Link href="/rewards" color="inherit" display="block">
              奖励中心
            </Link>
          </Grid>
          <Grid item xs={12} sm={4}>
            <Typography variant="h6" color="text.primary" gutterBottom>
              联系我们
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary" paragraph>
              邮箱: support@mathhelper.edu
            </Typography>
            <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary">
              电话: (123) 456-7890
            </Typography>
          </Grid>
        </Grid>
        <Box mt={3}>
          <Typography variant="body2" color="text.secondary" align="center">
            {'© '}
            {new Date().getFullYear()}
            {' 高数我帮你. 保留所有权利。'}
          </Typography>
        </Box>
      </Container>
    </Box>
  );
}

export default Footer;
